channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: JetBlue to offer lounge day passes at New York's JFK: Here's what it will cost
item.description: JetBlue is now allowing certain elite status members, credit card holders and Mint passengers to purchase one-time access to its new BlueHouse lounge ...

item.title: Act fast: Earn the Southwest Companion Pass by booking just 1 round-trip flight
item.description: Southwest's 2026 Companion Pass promotion lets you earn this valuable perk for a fraction of the usual cost.

item.title: Credit card transfer bonuses (February): 50% bonus to Marriott Bonvoy, 30% bonus to Japan Airlines and more
item.description: Here's a look at all the current transfer bonuses involving major credit cards and airline and hotel loyalty programs.

item.title: American Airlines adds 2 new Canadian routes from New York
item.description: American Airlines will link New York with Calgary and Quebec City this summer.

item.title: What are points and miles worth? TPGâ€™s February 2026 monthly valuations
item.description: Learn how points and miles from major loyalty programs stack up. Here's how TPG values each major credit card, hotel and airline rewards currency.
